Container.Name: backtail
Container.Overview: A secure, minimal and lightweight container providing a backup destination (via SFTP) through Tailscale.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Path: Backups
Config.Description: Destination Path for Backups. File '.ssh/authorized_keys' must exist containing SSH public key.

Config.Name: Path: Config
Config.Description: Persistent Path for Config. Contains: - Banner file - SSH Host key - Tailscale State Directory

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container.

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container.
